name: Ariadne Capital
overview:
Ariadne Capital Limited is an investment and advisory firm which incorporates three key businesses: (a) a corporate advisory firm (b) a fund management business “ACE”; and (c) a marketing /publishing thought leadership platform. Ariadne Capital Limited is backed by over 58 shareholders who are industry leading entrepreneurs and business builders across the sector that have helped shaped the sector and who continue to provide Ariadne with deal flow, investment, their networks and own insightful perspective on the markets in which they operate

The team at Ariadne are thought leaders in the digital space, advising companies (including start ups, growth stage companies, as well as larger established corporate companies) with regard to their digital strategies. Ariadne helps companies understand the digital landscape, and the relevant value creative go-to-market strategies at a given stage of the companies growth, helping to execute on these strategies: be it through raising capital, business development and partnership execution, and/or M&A.

Entrepreneur Country (part of Ariadne Capital) is a marketing and publishing platform which engages investors (HNWs and institutional), corporates, early to later stage growth stage companies , in addition to the media, government, and educational bodies. Entrepreneur Country engages through its regular invitation only thought leadership events, workshops, m-magazine, and on online website.

Ariadne Capital launched an early stage fund called the Ariadne Capital Entrepreneurs (ACE) Fund I in March 2011 investing in enabling technologies that drive new Ecosystem EconomicsTM that leverage key stakeholders (distribution partners, customers, other) driving inherent network effects.

The ACE fund invests in digital enablers to key verticals (including digital media, music & entertainment; mobile internet and communications applications; enterprise software and services, e-health, and digital home. The venture capital fund benefits from the operating partner activities of Ariadne Capital Limited.
